A

aInputTest - Variable in class com.bitsavior.screens.LoseScreen
to test input, if true: sends messages
antibug - Static variable in class com.bitsavior.asset.Assets
 
AntiBug - Class in com.bitsavior.entity
represents a helping bug that has a light attached and random movement
AntiBug(AssetManager) - Constructor for class com.bitsavior.entity.AntiBug
constructor load texture and attach lightsource
AppPreferences - Class in com.bitsavior.screens
"static" class that gives access to the settings made by the user
AppPreferences() - Constructor for class com.bitsavior.screens.AppPreferences
 
aScreenEasySwitch - Static variable in class com.bitsavior.screens.ScreenManager
when true: in titleScreen NUM1->winScreen and NUM2->loseScreen
aScreenTestMode - Static variable in class com.bitsavior.screens.ScreenManager
when true: prints create, show and dispose of screens
assets - Variable in class com.bitsavior.game.World
manages all game-assets
Assets - Class in com.bitsavior.asset
manages all the assets with easy access due to AssetDescriptors
Assets() - Constructor for class com.bitsavior.asset.Assets
constructor create new AssetManager and add a loader for tmx files
aStaticTest - Variable in class com.bitsavior.screens.SettingsScreen
for testing the Volume adjustments
attach(Entity) - Method in class com.bitsavior.entity.LightSource
attaches the lightsource to an entity attach an entity automatically sets the center of the lightsource to the center of the attached entity
aWorldTest - Variable in class com.bitsavior.game.World
if true: sends dispose message
